report.title: My Sites (JBC, Reptilewatch L2)
report.description: A list of sites I've created, or added to my list of sites (a custom person attribute).
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms lt ON lt.id=l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o ON o.website_id in (#website_ids#) AND ST_INTERSECTS(o.public_geom, COALESCE(l.boundary_geom, l.centroid_geom)) AND (st_geometrytype(o.public_geom)='ST_Point' OR NOT st_touches(o.public_geom, coalesce(l.boundary_geom, l.centroid_geom))) LEFT JOIN locations lc ON lc.parent_id=l.id AND lc.deleted=false AND lc.location_type_id IN (17562, 17563) #joins# #agreements_join# WHERE (o.id is null or (#sharing_filter#)) AND (l.public=true or lw.website_id in (#website_ids#)) AND l.deleted=false #idlist# #filters# #group_bys#

param.name: location_type_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of location_type_ids to allow for inclusion in the results.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of location IDs to filter to.

column.name: sections
column.sql: SUM(CASE WHEN lc.location_type_id=17562 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

column.name: refugia
column.sql: SUM(CASE WHEN lc.location_type_id=17563 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
